name: places/ChIJm0c4NuRYwokRQR2HiE841aY

displayName.text: Park View Dental : De Vito Rosario A. D.M.D.

formattedAddress: 220 E 57th St Suite 2BC, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 220 E 57th St Suite 2BC, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
I have been a patient of Dr. DeVito's for many years now and I wanted to take a moment to share my positive experience. Dr. DeVito is an exceptional dentist who takes the time to explain treatment options and is very gentle in his approach.

One time, I needed to have a dental filling and he even offered me a teddy bear to help soothe my nerves, which I found to be a very thoughtful gesture. As a medical provider myself, I know how important it is to have a doctor who is attentive and empathetic towards their patients.

Unfortunately, I have noticed that Dr. DeVito's Google rating is quite low and I wanted to express that this is completely misleading. Many caring physicians like Dr. DeVito do not actively solicit reviews, so the reviews on Google may only reflect a small number of unhappy patients.

Medical services are complex, and doctors have to multitask which means they may need to step away from patients momentarily to check x-rays or attend to administrative needs. The office is also very comfortable and inviting, and the staff is helpful, friendly, and on top of things.

While there may be the occasional billing mistake, these are inevitable as medical billing is complicated. With collaboration from patients, these issues can usually be resolved. If you are a realistic person, I highly recommend this office.

Thank you for providing exceptional care to your patients

originalText.text: Dr DeVito seems to know what he is doing, but I had to stop going there due to long wait times. He also leaves the room during the visit and dont come back for long time causing your appointment take really long. Wouldnt recommend if your time is valuable

text.text: Dr DeVito seems to know what he is doing, but I had to stop going there due to long wait times. He also leaves the room during the visit and dont come back for long time causing your appointment take really long. Wouldnt recommend if your time is valuable

originalText.text:
Doctor is good: always patient and explains everything.

BUT, there are hidden charges that they don't inform you, and my family has terrible experience with the dental assistant. She always messed up the bills and dental plan. My plan reached the annual maximum but she said it had sufficient balance. So, it ended up that I was asked to pay out of pocket in full. Ridiculous!

I will never visit his office because of his assistant. Always take care of your pocket, keep an eye on the bill, and don't trust what she told you! ALWAYS double check with you insurance company!!!

originalText.text: Been coming for about 4 years. Very pleased with quality of care and the team is great, as well.
